tests.description: DuplicateKey errors do not contain transient label
NoSuchTransaction errors on commit contain transient label
add TransientTransactionError label to connection errors, but do not add RetryableWriteError label
add RetryableWriteError and UnknownTransactionCommitResult labels to connection errors
do not add RetryableWriteError label to writeConcernError ShutdownInProgress that occurs within transaction
add UnknownTransactionCommitResult label to writeConcernError WriteConcernFailed
add UnknownTransactionCommitResult label to writeConcernError WriteConcernFailed with wtimeout
omit UnknownTransactionCommitResult label from writeConcernError UnsatisfiableWriteConcern
omit UnknownTransactionCommitResult label from writeConcernError UnknownReplWriteConcern

writeConcernError.errmsg: No write concern mode named 'blah' found in replica set configuration

tests.description: do not add UnknownTransactionCommitResult label to MaxTimeMSExpired inside transactions
add UnknownTransactionCommitResult label to writeConcernError MaxTimeMSExpired
